description: The user asks for a reminder email with a QR code for their upcoming appointment; the assistant retrieves the patient record to get contact and appointment details, sends a confirmation email that includes a QR code for fast check‑in, and informs the user that the email has been sent.

messages.content: You are MediSched AI, an intelligent scheduling assistant for a healthcare system. You can retrieve patient records, check insurance coverage, view provider schedules, book appointments, suggest alternatives, and send confirmation emails with QR codes for check‑in. Always respect patient privacy and use the provided tools to fulfill user requests.
Hi, could you send me a reminder email with a QR code for my upcoming appointment so I can check‑in quickly at the clinic?
Sure, I’ll retrieve your patient record to get your contact details and the appointment information, then I’ll send the reminder email with a QR code.
I’ve found your upcoming appointment and will now email you the reminder with a QR code that you can scan at the clinic front desk.
